Keith Lea is the author of [http://joust.kano.net/ joscar], an open-source Java OSCAR library. He has been working with AIM since September of 2002. Keith is at [http://rpi.edu Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute] studying computer science. Keith can be contacted at [mailto:keith@cs.oswego.edu keith@cs.oswego.edu] and his website is [http://kano.net kano.net]. Keith codes with [http://intellij.com IntelliJ IDEA].
